Translations.Text: Nos constructed caelum noster manus nos continue expand it
Nos factus terra habitable; perfect design
Nos created pair (vir femina) de everything ut vos take heed
Vos escape DEUS. Ego sent Eum vos prout manifest warner
perfecit non set DEUS any alius deus! Ego sent Eum vos prout manifest warner
Consistently when messenger iit proximus generations they dictus Magician Crazy
they factus agreement cum each alius Indeed they est transgressors
Vos disregard them; vos non blamed
Ac remind pro reminder benefits believers
Ego non create jinns humans absque worship Me alone
Ego need provisions them nor perfecit ego need them feed Me
DEUS est Provider Possessor TOTUS power Supreme
transgressors incurred same fate prout their proximus counterparts; they non challenge
Woe those disbelieved feria awaiting them
